00032 AppSettings::AppSettings(QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034       setupUi(this);
00035 
00036       setWindowTitle(tr("%1 settings").arg(APP_NAME));
00037       lblCaption->setText(tr("%1 settings").arg(APP_NAME));
00038 
00039       connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00040       connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00041 
00042       connect(comboProxyType, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(QString)), this, SLOT(comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString)));
00043 
00044       //Installing event filters for get buttuns
00045       cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00046       cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00047       cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00048       cmdGetWineLibs->installEventFilter(this);
00049       cmdGetTarBin->installEventFilter(this);
00050       cmdGetMountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00051       cmdGetUmountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00052       cmdGetSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00053       cmdGetGuiSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00054       cmdGetNiceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00055       cmdGetReniceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00056       cmdGetConsoleBin->installEventFilter(this);
00057       cmdGetWrestoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00058       cmdGetIcotoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00059       cmdGetShBin->installEventFilter(this);
00060 
00061       QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00062 
00063       settings.beginGroup("wine");
00064       txtWineBin->setText(settings.value("WineBin").toString());
00065       txtWineServerBin->setText(settings.value("ServerBin").toString());
00066       txtWineLoaderBin->setText(settings.value("LoaderBin").toString());
00067       txtWineLibs->setText(settings.value("WineLibs").toString());
00068       settings.endGroup();
00069 
00070       settings.beginGroup("app");
00071       if (settings.value("showTrareyIcon").toInt()==1){
00072             chShowTrarey->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00073       } else {
00074             chShowTrarey->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00075       }
00076 
00077 
00078       listThemesView->clear();
00079 
00080       QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
00081       iconItem = new QListWidgetItem(listThemesView, 0);
00082       iconItem->setText("Default [Aughtor: Xavier Corredor Llano (xavier.corredor.llano@gmail.com); License: GPL v.2.1]");
00083       iconItem->setIcon(QIcon(":data/wine.png"));
00084       iconItem->setToolTip("Default");
00085       listThemesView->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089       QString themeDir;
00090       themeDir.clear();
00091       themeDir.append(QDir::homePath());
00092       themeDir.append("/.config/");
00093       themeDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00094       themeDir.append("/theme/");
00095 
00096 
00097       getThemes(settings.value("theme").toString(), themeDir);
00098 
00099       loadThemeIcons(settings.value("theme").toString());
00100 
00101       if (settings.value("theme").toString()=="Default"){
00102             listThemesView->setCurrentItem(iconItem);
00103       }
00104 
00105       themeDir.clear();
00106       themeDir.append(APP_PREF);
00107       themeDir.append("/share/");
00108       themeDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00109       themeDir.append("/theme");
00110 
00111       getThemes(settings.value("theme").toString(), themeDir);
00112 
00113       getLangs();
00114 
00115       if (settings.value("lang").toString().isEmpty()){
00116             comboLangs->setCurrentIndex(comboLangs->findText(tr("System Default")));
00117       } else {
00118             comboLangs->setCurrentIndex(comboLangs->findText(settings.value("lang").toString()));
00119       }
00120 
00121       settings.endGroup();
00122 
00123       settings.beginGroup("system");
00124       txtTarBin->setText(settings.value("tar").toString());
00125       txtMountBin->setText(settings.value("mount").toString());
00126       txtUmountBin->setText(settings.value("umount").toString());
00127       txtSudoBin->setText(settings.value("sudo").toString());
00128       txtGuiSudoBin->setText(settings.value("gui_sudo").toString());
00129       txtNiceBin->setText(settings.value("nice").toString());
00130       txtReniceBin->setText(settings.value("renice").toString());
00131       txtShBin->setText(settings.value("sh").toString());
00132       settings.endGroup();
00133 
00134       settings.beginGroup("console");
00135       txtConsoleBin->setText(settings.value("bin").toString());
00136       txtConsoleArgs->setText(settings.value("args").toString());
00137       settings.endGroup();
00138 
00139       settings.beginGroup("advanced");
00140       txtMountString->setText(settings.value("mount_drive_string").toString());
00141       txtMountImageString->setText(settings.value("mount_image_string").toString());
00142       txtUmountString->setText(settings.value("umount_string").toString());
00143       settings.endGroup();
00144 
00145       if (txtMountString->text().isEmpty()){
00146 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00147             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_DRIVE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00148 #endif
00149 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00150             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 %MOUNT_DRIVE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00151 #endif
00152       }
00153 
00154       if (txtMountImageString->text().isEmpty()){
00155 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00156             txtMountImageString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_OPTIONS% %MOUNT_IMAGE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00157 #endif
00158 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00159             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 /dev/`%MDCONFIG_BIN% -f %%MOUNT_IMAGE%` %MOUNT_POINT%");
00160 #endif
00161       }
00162 
00163       if (txtUmountString->text().isEmpty())
00164             txtUmountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %UMOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00165 
00166 
00167 #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00168       settings.beginGroup("icotool");
00169       txtWrestoolBin->setText(settings.value("wrestool").toString());
00170       txtIcotoolBin->setText(settings.value("icotool").toString());
00171       settings.endGroup();
00172 #else
00173       txtWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00174       txtIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00175       cmdGetWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00176       cmdGetIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00177 #endif
00178 
00179       settings.beginGroup("network");
00180       txtProxyHost->setText(settings.value("host").toString());
00181       txtProxyPort->setText(settings.value("port").toString());
00182       txtProxyUser->setText(settings.value("user").toString());
00183       txtProxyPass->setText(settings.value("pass").toString());
00184 
00185       comboProxyType->setCurrentIndex(settings.value("type").toInt());
00186 
00187       settings.endGroup();
00188 
00189       return;
00190 }

00192 bool AppSettings::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
00193       /*
00194             function for displaying file\dir dialog
00195       */
00196 
00197       if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress) {
00198 
00199             QString file;
00200 
00201             if (obj->objectName().right(3)=="Bin"){
00202                   file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"), QDir::homePath(),   "All files (*)");
00203             } else {
00204                   file = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), QDir::homePath(),   QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00205             }
00206 
00207             if (!file.isEmpty()){
00208                   QString a;
00209 
00210                   a.append("txt");
00211                   a.append(obj->objectName().right(obj->objectName().length()-6));
00212 
00213                   QLineEdit *lineEdit = findChild<QLineEdit *>(a);
00214 
00215                   if (lineEdit){
00216                         lineEdit->setText(file);
00217                   } else {
00218                         qDebug("Error");
00219                   }
00220             }
00221       }
00222 
00223       return FALSE;
00224 }
00225 
00226 void AppSettings::comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString text){
00227       if (text==tr("No Proxy")){
00228             txtProxyHost->setEnabled(FALSE);
00229             txtProxyPort->setEnabled(FALSE);
00230             txtProxyUser->setEnabled(FALSE);
00231             txtProxyPass->setEnabled(FALSE);
00232       } else {
00233             txtProxyHost->setEnabled(TRUE);
00234             txtProxyPort->setEnabled(TRUE);
00235             txtProxyUser->setEnabled(TRUE);
00236             txtProxyPass->setEnabled(TRUE);
00237       }
00238 
00239       return;
00240 }
00241 
00242 void AppSettings::getLangs(){
00243 
00244       QString themeDir;
00245 
00246       themeDir.clear();
00247       themeDir.append(APP_PREF);
00248       themeDir.append("/share/");
00249       themeDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00250       themeDir.append("/i18n");
00251 
00252       QDir tmp(themeDir);
00253       tmp.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00254 
00255       QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00256 
00257       for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00258             QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00259             if (fileInfo.fileName().right(2)=="qm")
00260                   comboLangs->addItem(fileInfo.fileName());
00261       }
00262 
00263       return;
00264 }
00265 
00266 void AppSettings::getThemes(QString selTheme, QString themeDir){
00267       //Getting installed themes
00268 
00269       QString aughtor;
00270       QString license;
00271 
00272       QDir tmp(themeDir);
00273       tmp.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::NoSymLinks | QDir::NoDotAndDotDot);
00274       QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00275 
00276       QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
00277 
00278       // Getting converted icons from temp directory
00279       for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00280             QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00281             iconItem = new QListWidgetItem(listThemesView, 0);
00282 
00283 
00284             QFile file(tr("%1/%2/theme.info").arg(themeDir).arg(fileInfo.fileName()));
00285             if (file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text)){
00286                   aughtor = file.readLine();
00287                   aughtor.remove ( "\n" );
00288                   license = file.readLine();
00289             }
00290 
00291             if ((!aughtor.isEmpty()) and (!license.isEmpty())){
00292                   iconItem->setText(tr("%1 [%2; %3]").arg(fileInfo.fileName()).arg(aughtor).arg(license));
00293             } else {
00294                   iconItem->setText(fileInfo.fileName());
00295             }
00296             iconItem->setToolTip(tr("%1/%2").arg(themeDir).arg(fileInfo.fileName()));
00297             iconItem->setIcon(QIcon(tr("%1/%2/data/wine.png").arg(themeDir).arg(fileInfo.fileName())));
00298 
00299             if (!selTheme.isNull()){
00300                   if (selTheme==fileInfo.filePath()){
00301 
00302                         //Setting selection to selected theme
00303                         listThemesView->setCurrentItem(iconItem);
00304 
00305                         //Loading pixmaps from theme
00306                         loadThemeIcons(fileInfo.filePath());
00307                   }
00308             }
00309       }
00310 
00311       return;
00312 }
00313

00315 void AppSettings::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00316       QPixmap pixmap;
00317 
00318       if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00319             pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00320       }
00321 
00322       lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00323 
00324 
00325       cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00326       cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00327       cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00328       cmdGetWineLibs->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00329 
00330       cmdGetTarBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00331       cmdGetMountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00332       cmdGetUmountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00333       cmdGetSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00334       cmdGetGuiSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00335       cmdGetNiceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00336       cmdGetReniceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00337       cmdGetShBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00338 
00339       cmdGetConsoleBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00340       cmdGetWrestoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00341       cmdGetIcotoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00342 
00343       return;
00344 }

00346 
00347 QIcon AppSettings::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00348       // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00349       // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00350 
00351       QIcon icon;
00352 
00353       if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00354             icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00355             if (icon.isNull()){
00356                   icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00357             }
00358       } else {
00359             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00360       }
00361 
00362       return icon;
00363 }

00366 void AppSettings::cmdCancel_Click(){
00367       reject();
00368       return;
00369 }

00371 void AppSettings::cmdOk_Click(){
00372 
00373       if (!checkEntry(txtWineBin->text(), "wine"))
00374             return;
00375 
00376       if (!checkEntry(txtWineServerBin->text(), "wine server"))
00377             return;
00378 
00379       if (!checkEntry(txtWineLoaderBin->text(), "wine loader"))
00380             return;
00381 
00382       if (!checkEntry(txtWineLibs->text(), "wine library", FALSE))
00383             return;
00384 
00385       if (!checkEntry(txtTarBin->text(), "tar"))
00386             return;
00387 
00388       if (!checkEntry(txtMountBin->text(), "mount"))
00389             return;
00390 
00391       if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "umount"))
00392             return;
00393 
00394       if (!checkEntry(txtSudoBin->text(), "sudo"))
00395             return;
00396 
00397       if (!checkEntry(txtGuiSudoBin->text(), "gui_sudo"))
00398             return;
00399 
00400       if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "nice"))
00401             return;
00402 
00403       if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "renice"))
00404             return;
00405 
00406       if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "sh"))
00407             return;
00408 
00409       if (!checkEntry(txtConsoleBin->text(), "console"))
00410             return;
00411 
00412 #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00413       if (!checkEntry(txtWrestoolBin->text(), "wrestool"))
00414             return;
00415 
00416       if (!checkEntry(txtIcotoolBin->text(), "icotool"))
00417             return;
00418 #endif
00419 
00420       if (comboProxyType->currentText()!=tr("No Proxy")){
00421             if (txtProxyHost->text().isEmpty()){
00422                   QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy host."));
00423                   return;
00424             }
00425             if (txtProxyPort->text().isEmpty()){
00426                   QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy port."));
00427                   return;
00428             }
00429       }
00430 
00431       QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00432 
00433       settings.beginGroup("wine");
00434       settings.setValue("WineBin", txtWineBin->text());
00435       settings.setValue("ServerBin", txtWineServerBin->text());
00436       settings.setValue("LoaderBin", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00437       settings.setValue("WineLibs", txtWineLibs->text());
00438       settings.endGroup();
00439 
00440       settings.beginGroup("app");
00441       if (chShowTrarey->checkState()==Qt::Checked) {
00442             settings.setValue("showTrareyIcon", 1);
00443       } else {
00444             settings.setValue("showTrareyIcon", 0);
00445       }
00446 
00447       if (listThemesView->currentItem()){
00448             settings.setValue("theme", listThemesView->currentItem()->toolTip());
00449       } else {
00450             settings.setValue("theme", "Default");
00451       }
00452 
00453 
00454       if (comboLangs->currentText()==tr("System Default")){
00455             settings.setValue("lang", "");
00456       } else {
00457             settings.setValue("lang", comboLangs->currentText());
00458       }
00459 
00460       settings.endGroup();
00461       settings.beginGroup("system");
00462       settings.setValue("tar", txtTarBin->text());
00463       settings.setValue("mount", txtMountBin->text());
00464       settings.setValue("umount", txtUmountBin->text());
00465       settings.setValue("sudo", txtSudoBin->text());
00466       settings.setValue("gui_sudo", txtGuiSudoBin->text());
00467       settings.setValue("nice", txtNiceBin->text());
00468       settings.setValue("renice", txtReniceBin->text());
00469       settings.setValue("sh", txtShBin->text());
00470       settings.endGroup();
00471 
00472       settings.beginGroup("console");
00473       settings.setValue("bin", txtConsoleBin->text());
00474       settings.setValue("args", txtConsoleArgs->text());
00475       settings.endGroup();
00476 #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00477       settings.beginGroup("icotool");
00478       settings.setValue("wrestool", txtWrestoolBin->text());
00479       settings.setValue("icotool", txtIcotoolBin->text());
00480       settings.endGroup();
00481 #endif
00482 
00483 
00484             if (txtMountString->text().isEmpty()){
00485 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00486             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_DRIVE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00487 #endif
00488 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00489             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 %MOUNT_DRIVE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00490 #endif
00491       }
00492 
00493       if (txtMountImageString->text().isEmpty()){
00494 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00495             txtMountImageString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_OPTIONS% %MOUNT_IMAGE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00496 #endif
00497 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00498             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 /dev/`%MDCONFIG_BIN% -f %%MOUNT_IMAGE%` %MOUNT_POINT%");
00499 #endif
00500       }
00501 
00502       if (txtUmountString->text().isEmpty())
00503             txtUmountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %UMOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00504 
00505 
00506 
00507       settings.beginGroup("advanced");
00508       settings.setValue("mount_drive_string", txtMountString->text());
00509       settings.setValue("mount_image_string", txtMountImageString->text());
00510       settings.setValue("umount_string", txtUmountString->text());
00511       settings.endGroup();
00512 
00513       settings.beginGroup("network");
00514       settings.setValue("host", txtProxyHost->text());
00515       settings.setValue("port", txtProxyPort->text());
00516       settings.setValue("user", txtProxyUser->text());
00517       settings.setValue("pass", txtProxyPass->text());
00518       if (comboProxyType->currentText()==tr("No Proxy")){
00519             settings.setValue("type", 0);
00520       } else {
00521             if (comboProxyType->currentText()=="HTTP"){
00522                   settings.setValue("type", 1);
00523             } else {
00524                   settings.setValue("type", 2);
00525             }
00526       }
00527 
00528       settings.endGroup();
00529       accept();
00530       return;
00531 }
00532 
00533 bool AppSettings::checkEntry(QString fileName, QString info, bool isFile){
00534       /*
00535       * This function check user entry
00536       */
00537 
00538       if (fileName.isEmpty()){
00539             switch (isFile){
00540             case FALSE:
00541                   QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 directory.").arg(info));
00542                   break;
00543             case TRUE:
00544                   QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 binary.").arg(info));
00545                   break;
00546             }
00547             return FALSE;
00548       } else {
00549             if (!QFile::exists(fileName)){
00550                   switch (isFile){
00551                   case FALSE:
00552                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 directory not exists.").arg(info));
00553                         break;
00554                   case TRUE:
00555                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 binary not exists.").arg(info));
00556                         break;
00557                   }
00558                   return FALSE;
00559             }
00560       }
00561 
00562       return TRUE;
00563 }
